text: oglyphics 90% Abnormality of the ribs 90% Abnormality of the tricuspid valve 90% Asymmetric growth 90% Camptodactyly of finger 90% Diastomatomyelia 90% Duodenal stenosis 90% Hepatomegaly 90% Intestinal malrotation 90% Meningocele 90% Respiratory insufficiency 90% Situs inversus totalis 90% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
